alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 9:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Most of the camping areas and roadways in Burnside Lake Water Park are covered by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.9 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 14.8 Thu 7 pm CDT 14.7 13.9 13.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
